data.content: Profile column feature verified on main (commit 2f987cd). Implementation: profile column in beat-columns.tsx:534-575 with inline dropdown editing via builtinWorkflowDescriptors(). Bulk profile edit in filter-bar.tsx:109-122 as a Select component in BulkEditControls. All quality gates pass: TypeScript clean, lint clean, 73 test files / 1146 tests passing. Remote is up to date.
